description: Try our easy to follow Tassal Smoked Salmon With Abe's Bagels recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bagel,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Peanut free
name: Tassal Smoked Salmon With Abe's Bagels Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Abe's Bagel Bakery Sesame Seed, sliced
4 piece lemon, cut into wedges (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Slice and toast ABEâ€™S Sesame Bagels
Spread the bases with a mixture of cream cheese, chopped dill and lemon zest.
Top with slices of Tassal Smoked Tassie Salmon, thinly sliced red onion, drained baby capers and dill sprigs.
Sandwich with bagel tops and serve with lemon wedges.
